availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married Lydia Brewer Roberts in Owen County, Kentucky, on November 9, 1856. Merchant in Owen County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 222A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Lockport, p. 309A.
Find A Grave, "George Roberts (1821-1879)," Memorial #197340377, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/197340377 (accessed February 18, 2020).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #001943448, p. 52.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000272774, p. 561.
